column4: Hi all quick question, my wifi on my laptop has suddenly stopped working, no driver is detected in the additional drivers so I totally reinstalled 11.10 hoping it would solve it cause It was initially working but no such look, it's like the card is suddenly not detected, any ideas would be welcome?
is there a switch to enable / disable the wifi?
there is on but the light is orange?
the switch is in the on position
try the switch then run:  sudo iwlist scan
if no wifis are found, repress then rescan
it says that the interface doesn't support scanning
if you run:  sudo rfkill list    does it say the interface is blocked in any way?
nothing comes up after I type 'sudo rfkill list'
if you run:   sudo lshw -C network
does it say the interface is disabled or unclaimed or anything like that?
just ran it again now so I'm waiting for it
it didn't bring up anything else there, it's not just brought back up my username and the @ symbol etc
nothing is happening now, I ran that but after a while it just brought back up my username and the weird dollar symbol you know
